T02TD3043E:85b-0: @85b * // dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3043E:85b-1: sems can rnams kyi nad mi bzad pa drag po zhi bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02TD3043E:85b-2: seng ldeng gi lo ma brdungs te /
T02TD3043E:85b-3: btsir ba'i khu ba la bzlas pa stong phrag bdun bzlas na /
T02TD3043E:85b-4: 'brum bu me dbal nag po shin tu mi bzad pa'i nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3043E:85b-5: aa la ka'i lo ma 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i phye mar byas nas snga ma bzhin du bzlas nas /
T02TD3043E:85b-6: blud na gag lhog dang 'bras mi bzad pa zhi bar nges so //
T02TD3043E:85b-7: gla rtsi dang btsan dug sngags kyis zin pa la snga ma ltar bzlas nas blud na mdze nad mi bzad pa rnams zhi bar nges so //
T02TD3043E:85b-11: rma bya'i sgo nga ser po la snga ma ltar bzlas nas blud na /
T02TD3043E:85b-12: dug nad mi bzad ba las thar bar nges so //
T02TD3043E:85b-13: dar ya ka dmar po dang /
T02TD3043E:85b-14: skyer pa'i khanda la snga ma ltar bzlas nas blud na mkhris pa sha ya'i nad mi bzad pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3043E:85b-15: 'bras bu gsum pa dang pa la sha dang /
T02TD3043E:85b-16: tsi tra ka'i khu ba la snga ma ltar blud na smyo 'bog gi nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3043E:86a-1: pa dang ga pur gyi chu dang bzang drug gi me tog rnams la snga ma ltar bzlas nas blud na /
T02TD3043E:86a-2: rims kyi nad mi bzad pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD3043E:86a-3: mi bzad pa'i nad zhi bar byed pa gser gyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba /
T02TD3043E:86a-4: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
